message.content: {"given_definition_quality":35,"better_definition":"to open or turn on (something)","sentence":"打开电视。","image_prompt":"A person in a softly apocalyptic animation style is turning on a TV. The room and TV are simple, with gentle pastel post-apocalyptic lighting. The gesture of pressing a button or using a remote to open (turn on) the television is clear and child-friendly.","sentence_translation":"Turn on the TV."}
